verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> is <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

Esau <S%H6215><s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5711>Adah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and <S%H173>Aholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite;<s%>
And <S%H1315>Bashemath<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebajoth.<s%>
And <S%H5711>Adah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz;<s%> and <S%H1315>Bashemath<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7467>Reuel;<s%>

And <S%H173>Aholibamah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> and <S%H3281>Jaalam,<s%> and <S%H7141>Korah:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wives,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and his <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7075>substance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7408>got<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%> from the <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> their <S%H7399>riches<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> more <S%H7227>than<s%> that they might <S%H4480>dwell<s%> <S%H3427><s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein they were <S%H4033>strangers<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> them <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of their <S%H4735>cattle.<s%>
Thus <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir:<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> is <S%H123>Edom.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> Seir: <S%H8165><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1315>Bashemath<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H201>Omar,<s%> <S%H6825>Zepho,<s%> and <S%H1609>Gatam,<s%> and <S%H7073>Kenaz.<s%>

And <S%H8555>Timna<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H6370>concubine<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H1121>son;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6002>Amalek:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel;<s%> <S%H5184>Nahath,<s%> and <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah,<s%> and <S%H4199>Mizzah:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1315>Bashemath<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H173>Aholibamah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H802>wife:<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> and <S%H3281>Jaalam,<s%> and <S%H7141>Korah.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were <S%H441>dukes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> son of <S%H6215>Esau;<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H201>Omar,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H6825>Zepho,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%>

Duke <S%H441><s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H1609>Gatam,<s%> and <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H441>dukes<s%> that came of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H1121>son;<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H5184>Nahath,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H4199>Mizzah:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H441>dukes<s%> that came of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1315>Bashemath<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H173>Aholibamah<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H3281>Jaalam,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H7141>Korah:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H441>dukes<s%> that came of <S%H173>Aholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> is <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H441>dukes.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%> the <S%H2752>Horite,<s%> who <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan,<s%> and <S%H7732>Shobal,<s%> and <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah,<s%>

And <S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> and <S%H687>Ezer,<s%> and <S%H1789>Dishan:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H441>dukes<s%> of the <S%H2752>Horites,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3877>Lotan<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H2753>Hori<s%> and <S%H1967>Hemam;<s%> and <S%H3877>Lotan's<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> was <S%H8555>Timna.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> were <S%H428>these;<s%> <S%H5935>Alvan,<s%> and <S%H4506>Manahath,<s%> and <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> <S%H8195>Shepho,<s%> and <S%H208>Onam.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon;<s%> both <S%H345>Ajah,<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> was that <S%H6034>Anah<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3222>mules<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> as he <S%H7462>fed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2543>asses<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%> were <S%H428>these;<s%> <S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> and <S%H173>Aholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1787>Dishon;<s%> <S%H2533>Hemdan,<s%> and <S%H790>Esh-ban,<s%> and <S%H3506>Ithran,<s%> and <S%H3763>Cheran.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H687>Ezer<s%> are <S%H428>these;<s%> <S%H1092>Bilhan,<s%> and <S%H2190>Zaavan,<s%> and <S%H6130>Akan.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1789>Dishan<s%> are <S%H428>these;<s%> <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> and <S%H765>Aran.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H441>dukes<s%> that came of the <S%H2752>Horites;<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H7732>Shobal,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H6034>Anah,<s%>

Duke <S%H441><s%> <S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H687>Ezer,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H1789>Dishan:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H441>dukes<s%> that came of <S%H2753>Hori,<s%> among their <S%H441>dukes<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> there <S%H4427>reigned<s%> any <S%H4428>king<s%> over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And <S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H123>Edom:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H1838>Dinhabah.<s%>
And <S%H1106>Bela<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> of <S%H4480>Bozrah<s%> <S%H1224><s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
And <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H2367>Husham<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H8489>Temani<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And <S%H2367>Husham<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H911>Bedad,<s%> who <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5762>Avith.<s%>
And <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> of <S%H4480>Masrekah<s%> <S%H4957><s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
And <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> of <S%H4480>Rehoboth<s%> <S%H7344><s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1177>Baalhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And <S%H1177>Baalhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1924>Hadar<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H6464>Pau;<s%> and his <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4105>Mehetabel,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4308>Matred,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4314>Mezahab.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H441>dukes<s%> that came of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> after their <S%H4725>places,<s%> by their <S%H8034>names;<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H8555>Timnah,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H5933>Alvah,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H3509>Jetheth,<s%>
Duke <S%H441><s%> <S%H173>Aholibamah,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H425>Elah,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H6373>Pinon,<s%>
Duke <S%H441><s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H4014>Mibzar,<s%>

Duke <S%H441><s%> <S%H4025>Magdiel,<s%> <S%H441>duke<s%> <S%H5902>Iram:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> be the <S%H441>dukes<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> according to their <S%H4186>habitations<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H6215>Esau<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites.<s%>
